title: Best Football Books
itunes:title: Best Football Books
description:
A room full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – discuss the final episode of ‘Top 100 players of 2016’ and which players are candidates to “Make the Leap” in the upcoming season. Then to wrap the podcast, the heroes discuss some of the best football books they have ever read and the impact they had on their careers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
